articles.author: Albee Zhang, Ryan Woo
articles.title: China set to launch high-stakes mission to moon's 'hidden' side - Reuters
articles.description: China will send a robotic spacecraft in coming days on a round trip to the moon's far side in the first of three technically demanding missions that will pave the way for an inaugural Chinese crewed landing and a base on the lunar south pole.
